definition: topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: It took me twenty minutes to work out the problem.
sentences.chinese: 解這道題花了我二十分鐘。

sentences.english: He took ten minutes to solve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 解這道題花去他十分鐘時間。
